title: Afar (1999) Genesis Portion
description: This fragment of the Book of Genesis chapters 1 through 3, tells how God created the world. It is in the Afar language which is spoken in Djibouti, Eritrea, and Ethiopia. This fragment was translated and published by the British and Foreign Bible Society in 1999.

language.name: Afar
language.area: Eastern lowlands, Afar region. May be in Somalia. Also in Djibouti, Eritrea.
